The Right Stuff:1. This Week in Gay History with Jeff BixbyCOMMERCIAL: EZ-Trim2. As I See It with Prince Pannece. Includes clip of film "Desert Hearts".COMMERCIAL: NGTF Fund for Human Dignity with "Dear Abby" Abigail Van Buren3. Introduction by hosts Doris Fish and TippiCOMMERCIAL: R. Kassman, Purveyor of Fine Pianos4. M. G. Whitney, Speed Talk Institute5. Doris Fish and Tippi introduce David Nahmod6. David Nahmod discusses new films and shows in San Francisco7. Doris Fish and Tippi introduce Dr. Farkle8. Ask Dr. Farkle9. Doris Fish and Tippi introduce a clip from the film "Just Another Girl"COMMERCIAL: SF AIDS Foundation10. Doris Fish and Tippi show items they bought shopping.
